text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Tuesday as reported by the official Algerian news agency APS. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Fourteen "terrorists" were shot dead during an operation carried out by security forces in Algiers. Algiers mayor Ali Boucetta was killed on Monday by a stray bullet during this operation.
- An important "terrorist" group was wiped out during a security forces operation that lasted 14 hours.
- President Liamine Zeroual visits Vietnam, which is turning itself into an economic new powerhouse in Asia.
